creator: felixcatukpublic@hotmail.com
text:
Graph should show real time on x axis (to allow peak effects on performance to 
be diagnosed)
Graph would benefit from including figures for number of concurrent threads (so 
effect of ramp up could be determined).

GUI graphs will not evolve anymore in favor of Web report.
Besides there are plugins that provide this .
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
